Name: Floral Daiquiri
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of dried lavender sprig.
RINSE chilled glass with violet liqueur and set to one side.
MUDDLE blueberries in base of shaker.
Add other ingredients and SHAKE with ice.
Garnish with lavender sprig pegged to rim.
Review: A floral riff on a classic Daiquiri with a hint of berry fruitiness and a lavender pink hue courtesy of a blueberry threesome.
History: Created in 2016 by Andrii Osypchuk at Gaucho, Dubai, UAE.
